messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] notification
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks, Dia!  I like your creative style.  The whole notification thing gets me nervous, tho I know that it s really no big deal. Marcy ...
messages.messageBody:
Thanks, Dia! I like your creative style. The whole notification thing gets
me nervous, tho' I know that it's really no big deal.
Marcy


>From: "Dia Garland" <moocow@...>
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
>To: <unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] notification
>Date: Sat, 13 May 2000 14:58:48 -0500
>
>We here in NE are supposed to give either the name of a major publisher if
>we are using the whole curriculum (i.e. Abeka), or else give an outline of
>every book for every subject. HA! There is no way I am going to tie
>myself to that nonsense, so I list things like "self-directed research in
>various aspects of biological science" (we dissect body organs after
>butchering) and "student guided reading including biographies, local and
>American history". I guess they are impressed with my outline because in
>four years we have never even been questioned.
>
>Dia
